member.name: T:FbType
member.summary: Specifies the data type of a field, property, or FbParameter.

member.name: F:BigInt
member.summary: Exact numeric value. (SQL_INT64). This maps to Int64.

member.name: F:Binary
member.summary: An array of data. This maps to an Array.

member.name: F:Binary
member.summary: A stream of binary data (SQL_BLOB). This maps to an Array of type Byte.

member.name: F:Char
member.summary: A fixed-length character string (SQL_CHAR). This maps to String.

member.name: F:Date
member.summary: Date data in the format yyyymmdd (SQL_TYPE_DATE). This maps to DateTime.

member.name: F:Decimal
member.summary: Signed, exact, numeric value with a precision of at least p and scale s, The maximum precision is 18 (SQL_DECIMAL). This maps to Decimal.

member.name: F:Double
member.summary: Signed, approximate, numeric value with a binary precision 53 (SQL_DOUBLE). This maps to Double.

member.name: F:Float
member.summary: Signed, approximate, numeric value with a binary precision 24 (SQL_FLOAT). This maps to Single.

member.name: F:Integer
member.summary: Exact numeric value with precision 10 and scale 0 (SQL_LONG). This maps to Int32.

member.name: F:LongVarBinary
member.summary: Variable length binary. The maximum is set by the user (SQL_BLOB). This maps to an Array of type Byte.

member.name: F:NChar
member.summary: Unicode character string of fixed string length (SQL_TEXT). This maps to String.

member.name: F:NVarChar
member.summary: A variable-length stream of Unicode characters (SQL_TEXT). This maps to String.

member.name: F:NText
member.summary: Unicode variable-length character data. (SQL_WLONGVARCHAR). This maps to String.

member.name: F:Numeric
member.summary: Signed, exact, numeric value with a precision p and scale s This maps to Decimal.

member.name: F:SmallInt
member.summary: Exact numeric value with precision 5 and scale 0 (SQL_SHORT). This maps to Int16.

member.name: F:Text
member.summary: Variable length character data. Maximum length is data source–dependent (SQL_TEXT). This maps to String.

member.name: F:Time
member.summary: Time data in the format hhmmss (SQL_TYPE_TIME). This maps to DateTime.

member.name: F:TimeStamp
member.summary: Date data in the format yyyymmddhhmmss (SQL_TIMESTAMP). This maps to DateTime.

member.name: F:VarChar
member.summary: A variable-length stream character string (SQL_TEXT). This maps to String.
